title: Mr forfee
author: Mr forfee
content: A man called Eugene Fama  a key figure in modern finance, argued that btc was preordained to become worthless. His main concerns was  Bitcoin's volatility. This man refuse to understand that the decentralized nature and Supreme security have made it an attractive hedge against inflation and economic instabilityBitcoins future is great

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: There always will be fudsters that would deny BTC its future.Just sway these news or words away and keep being happy

comments.body: He isn't the first and he won't be the last either, there are many popular figures that were once like Eugene Fama, let's sit back and watch, very soon he will have the time to do his own research, every past hater failed to do their own research at first but later they have a change of mind. Many people have said that BTC reserve will never happen, I guess they are now surprised, the numbers of FUD on BTC have decreased a lot compared to a few years back, if ant new one appears now I won't be surprised anymore.

This man refuse to understand that the decentralized nature and Supreme security have made it an attractive hedge against inflation and economic instabilityBitcoins future is greatWatching people making imaginary comments on bitcoin always baffle me. Bitcoin is not what most people assume it to be. It's the most secure and decentralized form of money ever created. It is not like traditional currencies that government and banks can print endlessly, it has a fixed supply that makes it a true store of value. We have to admit that the future of finance is digital and Bitcoin is already leading the way. But who are we stop people from airing their views and opinions? Some of them are secret investors but want to trend by attacking bitcoin or using foul languages to attract attention while they go offline to invest in what they criticise publicly. Smh!

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: In 2024, bitcoin ETFs was approved and recently the US government also established bitcoin reserves, which means it has been recognized as an important asset at the national level. So it would be a waste of time to spend time listening to people who are still rambling that bitcoin is a scam, worthless or dying, let alone spending time arguing with them. Or they have other intentions and are just trying to manipulate us to achieve their goals. But whatever their reasons and intentions are, I think it is better to stay away from such people to avoid wasting time and instead focus on our bitcoin investment.
